channel.title: RSS with the best
channel.itunes:subtitle: A podcast series on RSS
channel.itunes:author: Jane Doe
channel.itunes:summary: Creating a well formed RSS feed is important for iTunes U. This weekly series follows the methods to ensure your success.
channel.description: Creating a well formed RSS feed is important for iTunes U. This weekly series follows the methods to ensure your success.

item.title: XML Basics
item.itunes:author: Jane Doe
item.itunes:subtitle: A short primer on RSS and XML
item.itunes:summary: The basics of RSS is XML. This episode will assist in the development of the RSS shell used for iTunes U RSS feeds.

item.title: Namespaces Demystified
item.itunes:author: Jane Doe
item.itunes:subtitle: Understanding how to extend XML through namespaces.
item.itunes:summary: Namespaces allow the extension of RSS to suit the needs of particular systems. iTunes U uses a custom namespace too.

item.title: Adding content & keywords
item.itunes:author: Jane Doe
item.itunes:subtitle: Filling out your RSS feeds.
item.itunes:summary: Now we have our structure in place, we will add item information and metadata
item.itunes:keywords: itunesu, xml, rss, tutorial, training, keywords, item
